keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Await at Drawbridge
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates await the lowering of the drawbridge to reach the Tower of Justice where Robin is held.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the crew's determination to rescue Robin despite overwhelming odds.

keyEvents.title: Kokoro Brings the Rocketman
keyEvents.description: Kokoro arrives with the Rocketman sea train at a critical moment during the rescue mission.
keyEvents.significance: The Rocketman represents Tom's legacy and becomes instrumental in the assault on the Tower of Justice.

geography: A judicial island of the World Government
climate: Perpetual daylight - the island is said to never experience nighttime
population: Government officials, Marines, and CP9 agents

keyEvents.title: Franky Reveals Pluton Blueprints
keyEvents.description: Inside the Tower of Justice, Franky reveals he has been carrying the Pluton blueprints inside his cyborg body.
keyEvents.significance: This revelation explains the true target of CP9's five-year mission.

keyEvents.title: Franky Burns the Pluton Blueprints
keyEvents.description: Franky burns the Pluton blueprints inside the Tower of Justice, destroying the only known blueprints to an ancient weapon.
keyEvents.significance: This irreversible action fundamentally alters the power balance in the One Piece world.

keyEvents.title: Rocketman Crashes into Tower
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates use the Rocketman train to crash directly into the Tower of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: This spectacular entrance marks the beginning of the final phase of the Enies Lobby battle.

geography: Main tower structure at Enies Lobby where judicial proceedings take place
